question: Show me schemes I am eligible for
answer:
Here are the government schemes you are eligible for based on your profile:

**[Bankable Scheme]**
- **Why You're Eligible**: You are from a Scheduled Caste, a permanent resident of Gujarat, aged 23, and your annual income is below ₹1,20,000, which qualifies you for this scheme.
- **Benefits**: This scheme supports unemployed individuals from SC backgrounds to undertake business activities.
- **How to Apply**: Register on the Gujarat Scheduled Caste Development Corporation website, fill out the application form, and upload the required documents.
- **Official Website**: [Gujarat Scheduled Caste Development Corporation](http://www.gscdc.gujarat.gov.in)

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!

question: Scheme For Subsidy On Interest For Establishment Of 1 To 20 Milch Animal Farm
answer:
Based on your profile, you are eligible for the following scheme:

**[Scheme For Subsidy On Interest For Establishment Of 1 To 20 Milch Animal Farm For Scheduled Caste]**
- **Why You're Eligible**: You are a permanent resident of Gujarat, belong to the Scheduled Caste category, and your annual income is below ₹1,20,000. You can apply if you obtain a loan for setting up the unit in the current financial year 2023-24.
- **Benefits**: You can purchase 1 to 20 milch animals and receive an interest subsidy of 12% on the bank loan amount for 5 years.
- **How to Apply**: Apply online at the I-Khedut Portal, fill out the application, and upload the required documents.
- **Official Website**: [I-Khedut Portal](https://ikhedut.gujarat.gov.in/iKhedutPublicScheme/Public/frm_Public_ANH2_SchemeApplicaiton.aspx)

If you have any further questions or need assistance with the application process, feel free to ask!

question: tell me more
answer:
Based on the updated scheme information and your profile, here are the schemes you are eligible for:

**[Scheme For Subsidy On Interest For Establishment Of 1 To 20 Milch Animal Farm For Scheduled Caste]**
- **Why You're Eligible**: You are a permanent resident of Gujarat, belong to the Scheduled Caste category, and your annual income is below ₹1,20,000. You can apply if you obtain a loan for setting up the unit in the current financial year 2023-24.
- **Benefits**: You can purchase 1 to 20 milch animals and receive an interest subsidy of 12% on the bank loan amount for 5 years.
- **How to Apply**: Apply online at the I-Khedut Portal, fill out the application, and upload the required documents.
- **Official Website**: [I-Khedut Portal](https://ikhedut.gujarat.gov.in/iKhedutPublicScheme/Public/frm_Public_ANH2_SchemeApplicaiton.aspx)

**[Post Matric Students of Class 11th & 12th (Scheduled Caste)]**
- **Why You're Eligible**: You belong to the Scheduled Caste category. If you are enrolled in Class 11th or 12th, you can apply.
- **Benefits**: Financial assistance for students from SC backgrounds to support their education.
- **How to Apply**: Obtain the application form from the respective educational institution and submit it along with the required documents.
- **Official Website**: Not specified.

**[Top Class Education For Scheduled Caste Students]**
- **Why You're Eligible**: You belong to the Scheduled Caste category. If you are pursuing studies beyond class 12th in a notified institution, you can apply.
- **Benefits**: Financial support for students from SC backgrounds pursuing higher education.
- **How to Apply**: Check with the educational institution for the application process and required documents.
- **Official Website**: Not specified.

If you have any further questions or need assistance with the application process, feel free to ask!
